text: Fany Pérez Gutiérrez (born 6 February 1967) is a Mexican politician from the National Action Party. From 2010 to 2012 she served as Deputy of the LXI Legislature of the Mexican Congress representing Tlaxcala. ==References== Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Tlaxcala Category:Women members of the Chamber of Deputies (Mexico) Category:Members of the Chamber of Deputies (Mexico) Category:National Action Party (Mexico) politicians Category:21st-century Mexican politicians Category:21st-century Mexican women politicians
title: Fany Pérez Gutiérrez
